title: lookAt_Hildr
body:
That's Hildr.
She seems nice.

title: lookAt_Mimir
body:
Is that head...
looking at me?

title: lookAt_bench
body:
Such a nice bench.
Almost like it doesn't belong here.
Must be my imagination.

title: lookAt_branch
body:
<<set $sawBranch to true>>

Just a little branch.
We may never know where it came from...

[[Mimir.lookAt.cameFrom]]

title: Mimir.lookAt.cameFrom
body:
Probably from one of these trees...

[[Monrjiall.lookAt.going]]

title: Monrjiall.lookAt.going
body:
Or where it is headed...

[[Mimir.lookAt.nowhere]]

title: Mimir.lookAt.nowhere
body:
Nowhere, most likely...

[[Monrjiall.lookAt.remember]]

title: Monrjiall.lookAt.remember
body:
...but we'll always remember it as the little branch that held on...

[[Mimir.lookAt.holdOn]]

title: Mimir.lookAt.holdOn
body: That's exactly what it DIDN'T do.

title: lookAt_helmet
body:
<<set $sawHelmet to true>>

A great helmet from a fallen warrior.
He's probably in Valhalla already.
Wait for me brother, I'll be there soon.

title: lookAt_shield
body:
<<set $sawShield to true>>

A shield. I'm thinking of getting one.
It will be useful in Valhalla, where all I will do is fight and drink.
Can't wait!

title: lookAt_goblet
body:
I could really use a drink right now.
Too bad this goblet is empty.
And there's no ale to be found.
In miles around.

title: lookAt_mound
body:
These mound is filled with termites.
These little bastards ate a whole in my uncle's boat once.
We didn't realize until we were out of view of the beach...
...and the surface.

title: lookAt_fallenTree
body:
I have to lift this up to prove my strength to that head.
If only it wasn't so heavy, I could really show him how strong I am.

title: lookAt_axeHandle
body: That's a firm looking wooden handle.

title: lookAt_axeHead
body:
That's axe head without a handle.
Such a sad thing to look upon.

title: lookAt_river
body:
This blasted river.
There has to be a way to cross it.

title: lookAt_tree
body:
It's a tree.
Conveniently close to that river that's getting in the way of adventure.

title: lookAt_treeBridge
body:
The newest improvement on Midgard.
The Mornjiall Bridge.

title: lookAt_axe
body:
My axe.
I like to keep it next to where my old axe used to be.

title: lookAt_default
body:
This is a default text..
You should provide some lookAt text for this!.
